headline: The Year of the Ugly Shoe: What’s Next for On, Deckers, and Crocs?
summary: Mark Reichel has always prioritized his health and being an involved parent and the two rarely came into conflict.  The consultant and father of two found he had more choices—and more chances to tailor his kicks—than ever before, swapping between On Cloud, Brooks, and Hokas with custom inserts from his local running shop.  At a time when dad sneakers, sandals with socks, and  Crocs  are on trend, many people are more concerned with how shoes feel than how they look.
